name: How to Add Structured Data to a Web Page
description: A simple step-by-step guide on how to implement structured data using JSON-LD on your website for better SEO.

step.name: Generate JSON-LD Schema
step.text: Use a schema generator or manually create your JSON-LD code based on the Schema.org type relevant to your content.

step.name: Insert the Code
step.text: Paste the JSON-LD code into the <head> or just before the closing </body> tag of your web page.

step.name: Validate with Google Tools
step.text: Use Googleâ€™s Rich Results Test or Schema Markup Validator to ensure there are no errors or warnings.
